passive.name: STONE SKIN
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) STONE SKIN
                                Gains a stack of Stone Skin whenever Wukong damages enemy champions, stacking up to 3 time(s). Each stack grants him 10 Armor  and heals him for 0.35% of his max Health  per second ().

q.name: (Q) GOLDEN STAFF
q.description:
(Q) GOLDEN STAFF
 8/7.5/7/6.5s   30 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Enhances Golden Staff's empowering effects on attacks every 10.5/9/7.5/6 seconds, increasing bonus damage by 50%. Champion takedowns reduce the cooldown of this ability's passive by 2 seconds getting a kill refreshes it.Active: Empowers the next attack to deal 83 bonus physical damage (60/90/120/150 + 35/40/45/50%% ). Wukong and his clones' attacks reduce Golden Staff's cooldown by 0.5 second(s).After casting this ability, Wukong's next attack gains bonus range.

w.name: (W) WARRIOR TRICKSTER
w.description:
(W) WARRIOR TRICKSTER
 14/13.5/13/12.5s   55/60/65/70 
                                
                                
                                Becomes invisible for 1 second(s) and dashes forward, leaving behind a clone for 3/3.5/4/4.5 seconds at his original position.The clone moves in the direction of the left joystick when the ability is cast, automatically attacking nearby enemies and mimicking Wukong's Golden Staff, Nimbus Strike, and Cyclone. The clone deals 20/30/40/50% of Wukong's damage.The clone takes 50% more damage and does not gain the empowering effects of Golden Staff's passive when it mimics the ability.

e.name: (E) NIMBUS STRIKE
e.description:
(E) NIMBUS STRIKE
 8s   40 
                                
                                
                                Moves toward a target while sending clones to 2 additional enemies nearby, dealing 70 physical damage (70/110/150/190  + 80% bonus ) to each enemy.After hitting the targeted enemy, Wukong gains 25/35/45/55% Attack Speed for 4 second(s).

r.name: (R) CYCLONE
r.description:
(R) CYCLONE
 80/70/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Extends his staff and spins to gain 20% Movement Speed, dealing physical damage equal to 141 (220% ) + 10/14/18% of enemies max health over 2 seconds. Enemies that are hit for the first time are knocked up.Clone can be recast once within 8 seconds.

core_items_detailed.description: Defensive boots that reduce physical damage from basic attacks. Essential against heavy AD compositions or when facing strong auto-attack based champions.
